addData

public void addData()
method to populate the map using class Question

addMapEntry

public void addMapEntry(java.lang.Integer key,
                        Questions q)
Takes two arguments representing a key and a value Adds the key and value to the map. If the key is already present the existing value is overwritten. Returns no value. Note that the map values are collections, so the second argument must be of an appropriate collection type.

printMap

public void printMap()
Iterates over the map's keys to print out a meaningful textual representation of the map's contents.

printMapValue

public void printMapValue(java.lang.Integer key)
Argument is a key in the map prints a meaningful textual representation of its associated value, otherwise prints an output line announcing that the key is not found.
